archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0634
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a product manager, I want to use data to show customers products for sale which we predict will be appealing to them, so that I can present customers with products relevant for them

properties.value: Could this be done via the external recommendation engine? Parked for architecture session. Open point: what would be the rules behind the suggestions (billing data, customer inventory, etc) This requirement is of high importance

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
